name: SleepSounds
0:
”Alexa, open sleep sounds”
”Alexa, start sleep sounds”
”Alexa, launch sleep sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sounds
des:
Transform your Alexa device into a sleep sanctuary with Sleep Sounds. Experience a variety of soothing sounds designed to help you relax and fall asleep faster.

Full Description:
Having trouble falling asleep? Introducing Sleep Sounds, an Alexa skill that envelops your bedroom with calming and consistent sounds, expertly crafted to improve your sleep quality and help you unwind after a long day.

With Sleep Sounds, you no longer need to count sheep.
Use simple voice commands like “Alexa, open Sleep Sounds” or “Alexa, play Ocean Waves” to begin your journey to better sleep. You can also set a sleep timer with commands such as “Alexa, stop in 30 minutes,” ensuring you can drift off without any interruption to your rest.

Sleep Sounds is perfect for:

Adults and children needing a peaceful environment for quality sleep.
Infants or toddlers who settle better with white noise or soft melodies.
Shift workers or travelers trying to sleep in noisy environments.
Anyone looking to enhance their meditation or relaxation routine with ambient sounds.
Let Alexa help you sleep better and wake up refreshed. Try Sleep Sounds tonight – sweet dreams are just a command away.

Activation Phrase: “Alexa, open Sleep Sounds”

Requirements: Compatible with all Alexa-enabled devices.

Note: Sleep timer functionality may vary depending on your specific Alexa device and regional software updates.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
